title: All in One - System Rescue Toolkit 2016-05-15 Boot ISO[by Robert
description:
[center][img]https://s31.postimg.org/6qbdj3nh7/Screenshot_Splash.png[/img]


All in One â€“ System Rescue Toolkit is designed to quickly and efficiently aid a technician with troubleshooting and repairing Windows based PCs.


[color=green]The Live CD portion contains the following utilities:

    AisleRiot Solitaire â€“ a collection of card games (Smartest thing I've seen in a repair tool like... ever. Think about it)
    Brasero â€“ burn CD/DVD
    Browser â€“ lightweight Ubuntu web browser
    Calculator
    Clonezilla â€“ partition and disk imaging/cloning program
    CPU stress test â€“ Mersenne prime CPU torture test
    Desktop Sharing â€“ VNC based desktop sharing
    Disks â€“ disk utility to manage SMART and disk partitions
    Disk Usage Analyzer â€“ graphical application to analyse disk usage
    GParted â€“ partition editor for graphically managing your disk partitions
    NT Password Reset â€“ Windows password removal utility
    PhotoRec â€“ file data recovery software
    Terminal â€“ Ubuntu Command Line Interface (CLI)
    TestDisk â€“ data recovery software designed to help recover lost partitions

When the AiO-SRT CD or USB is inserted into a Windows computer, the program AiO-SRT.exe can be run and contains the following utilities:

General

    Task Manager
    System Analyzer
    Web Browser â€“ portable web browser
    File Manager for Technicians â€“ ignores NTFS permissions
    RoboCopy GUI â€“ quickly copy a bunch of files without stopping for errors
    Resource Monitor
    CD/DVD Drive Emulator â€“ portable drive emulator to mount disc images
    Build AiO-SRT Flash Drive
    Donâ€™t Sleep â€“ prevent sleep, hibernate, shutdown, and screensaver
    Reboot Safe Mode

Hardware

    CPU Stress Test
    Memory Diagnostics
    Hard Drive Diagnostics
    Disk Management
    Defrag System Drive
    System Information
    Device Manager
    Hardware Monitor Sensors
    LCD Dead Pixel Test
    Hard Drive Usage

    Autoruns
    System File Checker

    Command Prompt (Admin)

    Repair Explorer Icons
